summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Raama ERP - a poetic platform. All backend APIs working perfectly (14/14 tests passed). Frontend functionality working well with minor UI warnings. Both Writer and Reader roles tested successfully with proper role-based access control.

design_issues.issue: Missing Description or aria-describedby attributes in modal dialogs

passed_tests: Dashboard display with stats and notifications
Shayari creation via floating button and sidebar button
My Shayari page displays user's shayaris correctly
Profile page shows user information and stats
Theme toggle between dark and light mode
All backend API endpoints (auth, shayaris, users, notifications, stats)

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (All major functionality working, minor accessibility warnings)
